sentence.Network_en: He was kneeling by his bed in an attitude of devotion.
Better die standing than live kneeling.
sentence.Network_cn: 宁愿站着死,不愿跪着生.

sentence.Network_en: Kneeling in front of the open hearth, old Maria was fanning the smoldering fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 老玛丽亚跪在壁炉前的空地上，扇着闷燃的炉火。

entry.def: When you kneel, you bend your legs so that your knees are touching the ground.

example.ex: She knelt by the bed and prayed...
Other people were kneeling, but she just sat.
example.tran: 其他人跪着，而她只是坐着。
